title: After The Robots Died; Rey Rabbits: Issue #1
description: Arriving as embryos and raised by robots, a colony of children on a distant planet struggle to survive when the robots who raised them begin to shut down.A dynamic story that can best be described as a cross between "Invasion of the Body Snatchers" and "Ender's Game". Great for middle grade and YA readers.First place winner in the 2023 Firebird Book Awards for Comics and Graphic Novels!
author: Carolyn Watson-Dubisch
